programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Mexico City Favorites
programme.desc: Christopher Kimball travels to Mexico City to learn favorite dinner recipes! Back in the kitchen, we make Salsa Verde and Tortilla Casserole (Pastel Azteca), and Pork in Veracruz Sauce (Puntas a la Veracruzana).

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Middle Eastern Meets London
programme.desc: The Milk Street team looks for inspiration in London’s Middle Eastern restaurants. Featured recipes include: Jerusalem-Style Mixed Grill Chicken, Cauliflower with Spiced Tahini, and an Almond-Coconut Cake with Cherries and Pistachios.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Tuesday Night Bologna
programme.desc: Christopher Kimball heads to Bologna, Italy to learn a simple weeknight menu. Back in the kitchen, we make Italian Flourless Chocolate Torta, Spaghetti Aglio e Olio with Tomatoes and Basil, and Italian Bean Soup with Fresh Pasta.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Portuguese Classics
programme.desc: Milk Street takes a dive into Portuguese cuisine! Featured recipes include: Portuguese Sponge Cake; Madeiran Pork with Wine and Garlic (Carne Vinha d’Alhos); Garlic and Cilantro Soup with Chickpeas (Açorda Alentejana).

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Israel New And Old
programme.desc: Chris Kimball travels to Israel to learn from local cooks. We make Lebanese Baked Kafta with Potatoes and Tomatoes, Hummus with Chipotle Black Beans and Salsa and Yeasted Flatbreads with Za’atar Oil.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Milk Street Vegetarian
programme.desc: Explore different ways that vegetables can become the star of the plate! Vegetarian recipes include: Cauliflower Steaks with Pickled Peppers, Capers and Parmesan; Mushroom and Cheese Quesadillas; Panzanella with Fresh Mozzarella.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: The Secrets Of Amalfi
programme.desc: Milk Street learns recipes inspired by the sweet softball-sized lemons found along the Amalfi Coast of Italy! Featured recipes include: Spaghetti with Lemon Pesto; Lemon and Shrimp Risotto with Fresh Basil; Amalfi-Style Lemon Cake.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Cheryl Day Bakes Cakes!
programme.desc: Chris Kimball visits Cheryl Day in Savannah, Georgia to learn Southern baking. Featured recipes include: Sweet Potato Cupcakes with Cream Cheese-Caramel Frosting; Glazed Sour Cream and Brown Sugar Bundt Cake; Chocolate Layer Cake.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Taste Of Vietnam
programme.desc: Milk Street takes a look at home cooking in Ho Chi Minh City to learn bold and simple dishes. Featured recipes include: Vietnamese Beef Stew with Star Anise and Lemon Grass; Vietnamese Scallion Sauce; Vietnamese Braised Lemon Grass Chicken.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Everyday Venice
programme.desc: Milk Street looks to Venice’s cucina povera to prepare rustic, yet vibrant dishes! Featured recipes include: Venetian Rice and Peas (Risi e Bisi); Polenta with Shrimp and Tomatoes; Venetian Cornmeal and Currant Cookies.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: The Turkish Kitchen
programme.desc: Christopher Kimball creates Turkish dishes with big flavor! Featured recipes include: Spinach and Cheese Gözleme; Turkish Tomato and Onion Salad; Rib-Eye Steaks with Rosemary and Pomegranate Molasses.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Milk Street Chocolate Cakes
programme.desc: In this episode, Milk Street creates two delicious yet different chocolate cakes! Featured recipes include: Chocolate-Hazelnut Cream Cake; Swedish “Sticky” Chocolate Cake with Flavored Whipped Cream.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: Summer Kitchens
programme.desc: Milk Street learns about the cooking traditions of Ukraine’s summer kitchens. Featured recipes include: Chicken Roasted with Garlic-Herb Crème Fraîche; Ricotta-Semolina Cake with Caramelized Apples.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.sub-title: The New NY Cheesecake!
programme.desc: Milk Street takes a fresh look at delicious desserts. Featured recipes include: Chèvre Cheesecake with Black Pepper-Graham Crust; Raspberry Mascarpone Freeform Tart; Yogurt Loaf Cake with Coriander and Orange.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Suzanne Pleshette, Dom Deluise, Bobby Fischer (11/8/72)
programme.desc: Suzanne Pleshette recites a poem. Chess champion Bobby Fischer does a numbers puzzle in just a few seconds. Dom DeLuise took a casserole into a sauna.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Rivers, Jack Lemmon (1/3/73)
programme.desc: Johnny and Joan Rivers admit to stealing hotel soap; Jack Lemmon appears with the legendary director Billy Wilder

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Muhammad Ali, Robert Blake (2/8/73)
programme.desc: Johnny ribs Burbank during the monologue, Muhammad Ali details his training regimen, Robert Blake was embarassed to do a nude scene.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Charles Grodin, The Amazing Randi (3/22/73)
programme.desc: The Amazing Randi does a stunt involving a ladder. Charles Grodin details a recent harrowing plane flight.

programme.title: Little Rascals Shorts
programme.sub-title: Canned Fishing
programme.desc: Spanky and Alfalfa plot to play hooky so they can go fishing, by pretending that Alfalfa is sick and Spanky should stay with him while the parents are away.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Clint Eastwood, Robert Klein, Buddy Hackett, Telly Savalas (4/3/73)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood is on to talk Spaghetti Westerns and promote High Plains Drifter. Robert Klein does standup and Buddy Hackett drops in. Telly Savalas is about to do a TV series.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Gunther Gebel-Williams, Sid Caesar, Art Carney, Christopher Plummer (5/18/73)
programme.desc: Gunther Gebel-Williams brings out some circus tigers, Christopher Plummer shares stories from the stage, Art Carney leads Sid Caesar and Johnny in a jazz song.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Wilt Chamberlain, Michael Landon, Johnny Mathis (9/28/73)
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is leaving the Lakers, Michael Landon talks Bonanza, and Johnny Mathis sings "I'm Going Home."

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Leo Durocher, Don Rickles, Olga Fikotová (11/14/73)
programme.desc: Leo Durocher talks retirement, Don Rickles accidentally bumps Ed but gives him a kiss to make up for it, Olga Fikotová arm wrestles Johnny and gives a stretching lesson.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Embery, Buddy Hackett, Steve Martin (11/22/73)
programme.desc: Joan Embery brings out baby orangutans for Johnny and Ed, Buddy Hackett talks golf and tennis before sharing some snacks, Steve Martin does a comedy routine and plays the banjo.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jack Benny, Mel Blanc, Jim Henson & The Muppets (1/23/74)
programme.desc: Jack Benny has a lengthy visit, Mel Blanc explains the origin of his signature cartoon voices, Jim Henson and Kermit the Frog sing "It's Not Easy Being Green."

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Michael Landon, Bill Withers, Suzanne Somers (2/21/74)
programme.desc: Michael Landon talks about Bonanza and visiting Hawaii, Bill Withers performs "Ain't No Sunshine When You're Gone," and Suzanne Somers makes her first ever Tonight Show appearance.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Gene Hackman, McLean Stevenson, George Carlin (3/21/74)
programme.desc: After a monologue touching on gas prices, Johnny welcomes MASH's McLean Stevenson. George Carlin makes his 2nd Tonight Show appearance and Gene Hackman promotes The Conversation.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Suzanne Pleshette, Dom Deluise, Bobby Fischer (11/8/72)
programme.desc: Suzanne Pleshette recites a poem. Chess champion Bobby Fischer does a numbers puzzle in just a few seconds. Dom DeLuise took a casserole into a sauna.

programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Rivers, Jack Lemmon (1/3/73)
